import React from "react"; import classNames from "classnames"; import { SectionTilesProps } from "../../utils/SectionProps"; import SectionHeader from "./partials/SectionHeader"; import Image from "../elements/Image"; const propTypes = { ...SectionTilesProps.types, }; const defaultProps = { ...SectionTilesProps.defaults, }; const FeaturesTiles = ({ className, topOuterDivider, bottomOuterDivider, topDivider, bottomDivider, hasBgColor, invertColor, pushLeft, ...props }) => { const outerClasses = classNames( "features-tiles section", topOuterDivider && "has-top-divider", bottomOuterDivider && "has-bottom-divider", hasBgColor && "has-bg-color", invertColor && "invert-color", className ); const innerClasses = classNames( "features-tiles-inner section-inner pt-0", topDivider && "has-top-divider", bottomDivider && "has-bottom-divider" ); const tilesClasses = classNames( "tiles-wrap center-content", pushLeft && "push-left" ); const sectionHeader = { title: "Tokenomics", paragraph: "Designed to reward hodlers", }; return (

4% Charity

4% of every transaction is moved to the charity wallet for 50/50 giveaways and contests where half goes to charity and half goes to a hodler.

2% Reflection

2% of every transaction is automatically distributed back to every hodler's wallet to incentivise long term investing.

2% Liquidity

2% of every transaction is added back into liquidity to help stablize the price by protecting against large sells.

1% Marketing

1% of every transaction is moved to the marketing wallet which is used to further the success of the token. It will be used to hire devs/designers/marketers and to pay for ads

Robust Workflow

); }; FeaturesTiles.propTypes = propTypes; FeaturesTiles.defaultProps = defaultProps; export default FeaturesTiles;
